comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Negative inscribed with date, 6/17 (June 17), in lower right corner (in reverse). The convention was held in June, 1912.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Seven men are in the photo. The Political Graveyard (q.v.) lists the names of forty Texas delegates to the 1912 G.O.P. Convention -- and a full complement of alternates, as well: politicalgraveyard.com/parties/R/1912/TX.html
